meanings.sent1: The postponed meeting will now take place next week.
meanings.sent2: The game was postponed due to bad weather.
meanings.sent3: The postponed picnic made everyone sad, but we had a fun indoor party instead.
meanings.sent4: Her postponed dreams of traveling the world finally came true.
meanings.sent5: The postponed flight left passengers feeling frustrated and anxious.

meanings.definition: Put off until a later time.
meanings.sent1: She postponed her dentist appointment until next month.
meanings.sent2: The construction work was postponed until the following week.
meanings.sent3: He postponed doing his homework by playing video games instead.
meanings.sent4: The decision to postpone the project led to a rush to meet the deadline later.
meanings.sent5: The team postponed the celebration until they won the championship.
